## inspr get apps

Get apps from context 

```
inspr get apps [flags]
```

### Examples

```
  # Get apps from the default scope
 inspr get apps 

  # Get apps from a custom scope
 inspr get apps --scope app1.app2

```

### Options

```
  -h, --help           help for apps
  -s, --scope string   inspr <command> --scope app1.app2
```
